analysis.description: ToAddress.toAddr (/unique_chucks/30/0x747eb159926ac112ef0d9004ecb721d5c18ac56b.sol#305-309) is declared view but contains assembly code

ZzzInvest.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x747eb159926ac112ef0d9004ecb721d5c18ac56b.sol#67-200) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- regBlock[msg.sender] == 0
	- remaining[msg.sender] == 0
